questions.question: This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a corrupt government agency on an island known for its judicial powers. What is...?
This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates exploring a dangerous, beast-filled island and confronting a mad scientist. What is...?
This arc showcases the history of Sanji and the power struggle within the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is an expert sniper known for his long nose and dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This chief of staff of the Revolutionary Army is known for his flame powers and is a sworn brother to the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
